name: pigallery2
description: PiGallery2 is a fast static gallery generator and viewer designed for hosting image collections on a server or NAS. It offers hierarchical browsing, tagging, and a responsive UI.
features: Static generation: Generate static gallery pages for fast loading without server-side processing.
Hierarchical browsing: Navigate photos organized by folder structure with breadcrumb navigation.
Metadata tagging: Tag photos with keywords, people, and locations for organized searching.
Responsive design: Adapts to different screen sizes for optimal viewing on desktop, tablet, and mobile.
Lightbox viewer: View photos in fullscreen with keyboard navigation and zoom controls.
Video support: Play video files alongside photos with HTML5 video player integration.
Map integration: Display photos on interactive maps based on GPS coordinates from EXIF data.
Search functionality: Find photos by tags, dates, locations, and other metadata fields.
Thumbnail caching: Generate and cache thumbnails for fast gallery loading and browsing.
Sharing options: Share albums and photos with customizable access permissions.
Performance optimized: Designed for hosting large photo collections on NAS or low-power servers.
Face detection: Automatically detect and tag faces in photos for people-based organization.
